name: Therme Zen white lotus foaming shower
composition: INGREDIENTS: AQUA, SODIUM C14-16 OLEFIN SULFONATE, GLYCERIN, ISOPENTANE, COCAMIDOPROPYL HYDROXYSULTAINE, PARFUM, SODIUM LAUROYL SARCOSINATE, ACRYLATES/STEARETH-20 METHACRYLATE COPOLYMER, ISOBUTANE, COCO-GLUCOSIDE, PHENOXYETHANOL, PROPYLENE GLYCOL, TETRASODIUM EDTA, SOY ACID, LAURETH-4, COCAMIDE MIPA, HEXYL CINNAMAL, ETHYLHEXYLGLYCERIN, SODIUM HYDROXIDE, POLYQUATERNIUM-39, BENZYL BENZOATE, CAPRYLIC ACID, CAPRIC ACID, ALPHA-ISOMETHYL IONONE, HYDROXYCITRONELLAL, LINALOOL, SODIUM BENZOATE, TOCOPHEROL.
